mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL) VALUES(#{member_id},#{member_password},#{member_name},#{member_gender},#{member_email})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_POINT, MEMBER_PHONE1 , MEMBER_REG FROM MEMBER
